author: ptcox
body: Replaced a long-standing const_cast embedded in CSCGeometry.cc 9 years ago. I think it was probably done because no const GeomDetType\* was available then? But a year or two later the organization of the GeomDetType's seemed to settle down and it could have been fixed as I have done here. I've run the runthematrix Reco tests in case of some astonishing feedthrough effects but they all pass just fine :)
title: csc geom kill const cast
